    • execute

      public String execute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
      Is called when the target falls off a Cliff or a high ground. All the Items and Weapons carried by target with the portable boolean will be dropped to the location in the game map where the target was.
      Specified by:
      execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action
      Parameters:
      actor - : The Actor performing the action.
      map - : The map the Actor is on.
      Returns:
      result of the action to be displayed on the UI.
